EmailTemplate.description: Push email sent the subsidiary user involved in the experience to call back the friend. 21 days after the Purchase order sent and the Purchase Order is not approuved by customer
EmailTemplate.name: PJ ByFor Experience TEmail Notify the Estimates Delevery Date
EmailTemplate.subject: By&For: Estimated Delivery Date
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Planning Team,
The {!PJ_ByFor_Experience__c.PJ_ByFor_Experience_Client_Full_Name__c}'s By&For took place in {!PJ_ByFor_Experience__c.PJ_ByFor_Countries__c}. For your information, the estimated delivery date is {!PJ_ByFor_Experience__c.PJ_ByFor_Estimated_timing_delivery__c}.
Please schedule the bottling with the following information. Link
Please write an email to the Brand Company with the scheduled date.
Kindest regards,
By&For Team
